name: Sky Bomb Factory
description:
This tower defense game was made in practice while learning a course on Udemy with gamedev.tv, so this game is so basic and have only one type of  towers, one type of enemies, and only one level of difficulty. 

Even though it's super basic, I made it with love, and I like it <3

more games are to be made once I finish learning by the will of God, later games will have more sense to them and won't be left uncompleted like this one ;) 

How to play:

Left click to build towers 
You can build only 4 towers 
You can re-locate your towers 
You cannot build towers on the enemy's path
Have fun beating my score (93) ^^

Credits:

Tower shooting sounds provided by Erokia/Jordan Powell from Freesound.org / https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/sounds/427396/ / This work is licensed under the Attribution License.

Enemy death sounds provided by StormwaveAudio from Freesound.org / https://freesound.org/people/StormwaveAudio/sounds/330629/ / This work is licensed under the Attribution License.
